Hi John,

Thanks for the heads up. I had not thought to check Fujishiro's. I also disagree. If 
you separate out just the three characters from the longer inscription in Fujishiro's, 
you will see that these characters are very close. I think this is his man. Shimada 
Sadasuke of circa Kanei. Note also the yasuri and nakago-jiri match.

Gordon
